About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

PROFILE

I am student of Universiti Sultan Zainal Abidin and is currently pursing my study in Bachelor of Information Technology (Informatics Media) with Honours. I am currently seeking for an internship placement for six months to enhance my designing skills, creativity and ability in the field of Information Technology of Informatics Media. I would like to work with other professionals to increase my knowledge in information technology which will allow me to further contribute in the field.
